languages.text: "Жаль, что ты не умертвил еще и Инцендию — избавил бы меня от кучи проблем".

traits.locale_text: "Жаль, что ты не умертвил еще и Инцендию — избавил бы меня от кучи проблем".

languages.text: "Shame that you did not kill Incendia too while you were at it. That would have saved me a lot of trouble."
languages.original_text: "Жаль, что ты не умертвил еще и Инцендию — избавил бы меня от кучи проблем".

traits.locale_text: "Shame that you did not kill Incendia too while you were at it. That would have saved me a hell of a lot of trouble."
"Shame that you did not kill Incendia too while you were at it. That would have saved me a hell of a lot of trouble."
"Shame that you did not kill Incendia too while you were at it. That would have saved me a hell of a lot of trouble."
"Shame that you did not kill Incendia too while you were at it. That would have saved me a hell of a lot of trouble."
"Shame that you did not kill Incendia too while you were at it. That would have saved me a lot of trouble."
"Shame that you did not kill Incendia too while you were at it. That would have saved me a lot of trouble."

languages.text: “真可惜，你没把因森蒂娅也一起杀了，那样会给我省掉不少麻烦。”
languages.original_text: "Shame that you did not kill Incendia too while you were at it. That would have saved me a lot of trouble."

traits.locale_text: “真可惜，你没把因森蒂娅也一起杀了，那样会给我省掉不少麻烦。”

languages.text: 「インセンディアも殺さなかったとは実に見下げ果てたことだ。殺していれば、こうも{mf|俺|私}の周りで問題が起きなかっただろうに」
languages.original_text: "Shame that you did not kill Incendia too while you were at it. That would have saved me a lot of trouble."

traits.locale_text: 「インセンディアも殺さなかったとは実に見下げ果てたことだ。殺していれば、こうも{mf|俺|私}の周りで問題が起きなかっただろうに」

languages.text: «Lástima que no matase a Incendia también. Eso me habría ahorrado un montón de problemas».
languages.original_text: "Shame that you did not kill Incendia too while you were at it. That would have saved me a lot of trouble."

traits.locale_text: «Lástima que no matase a Incendia también. Eso me habría ahorrado un montón de problemas».

languages.text: "Ein Jammer, dass Ihr Incendia nicht getötet habt, wo Ihr schon dabei wart. Das hätte mir viel Ärger erspart."
languages.original_text: "Shame that you did not kill Incendia too while you were at it. That would have saved me a lot of trouble."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Jammer, dass Ihr Incendia nicht getötet habt, wo Ihr schon dabei wart. Das hätte mir verflucht viel Ärger erspart."

languages.text: « Dommage que vous n'ayez pas tué Incendia tant que vous y étiez. Cela m'aurait épargné bien des ennuis. »
languages.original_text: "Shame that you did not kill Incendia too while you were at it. That would have saved me a lot of trouble."

traits.locale_text: « Dommage que vous n'ayez pas tué Incendia tant que vous y étiez. Ça m'aurait épargné bien des ennuis. »

languages.text: "Bu sırada İncendia'yı öldürmemiş olman çok yazık. Beni büyük bir dertten kurtarmış olurdun."
languages.original_text: "Shame that you did not kill Incendia too while you were at it. That would have saved me a lot of trouble."

traits.locale_text: "Bu sırada İncendia'yı öldürmemiş olman çok yazık. Beni büyük bir dertten kurtarmış olurdun."
